summary: This is an FBI Suspicious Activity Report (SAR) regarding Jeffrey Epstein, generated by the FBI's New York office, specifically from the Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad. It appears to be a formal notification or filing related to financial or other suspicious activity concerning Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Subject of the Suspicious Activity Report
persons.context: He is the central subject of the FBI's Suspicious Activity Report, indicating he is under investigation for activities potentially related to crimes against children or human trafficking.

events.title: FBI Files Epstein Suspicious Activity Report
events.description: The FBI's New York office, specifically the Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad, generates and files a Suspicious Activity Report (SAR) concerning Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The FBI's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad in New York filed a Suspicious Activity Report (SAR) on Jeffrey Epstein.
The report was generated on August 9, 2019.
The document type and subject indicate the FBI was investigating Epstein for potential financial or other activities linked to crimes against children or human trafficking.
